com.github.dakusui.actionunit.actions.cmd.unix

Interface SshOptions


  • public interface SshOptions

    Models options common to both ssh and scp commands. (see below). <pre> -4 : IPv4 -6 : IPv6 -C : compression -c : cipher spec -F : config file -i : identity -o : ssh option -p (-P for scp) : port -q : quiet -v : verbose </pre>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SshOptions.Builder 
      static interface  SshOptions.Formatter
